name: Delayed reminder of unfulfilled orders
description: Send a reminder about unfulfilled orders to the store owner email 2 days after the order is completed.

name: High risk order alert
description: Use this template if you want to inform about the high risk order.

name: Product quantity alert
description: Send a message with an alert about a small number of goods to the store owner's email.

name: Marketing tags
description: Use this template if you want to assign tags for users who agree to get marketing.

name: Archive free orders on fulfillment
description: Archive orders with zero total when them fulfilled.

name: Block list by mail or id
description: Use this template if you want to create a block list of customers by mail or user id.

name: Low-risk orders auto payment capture
description: Use this template if you want to set auto payment capture for low-risk orders.

name: Delayed request for a review
description: Send a request for a review to users with a completed order in a week.

name: Tags for foreign currencies
description: Use this template if you want to assign tags for users with foreign currencies.

name: Thank you message
description: Send a thank you message for ordering by mail.

name: Tag VIP Customers
description: Assign a special VIP tag to customers who make the biggest number of orders.

name: Tag the order by purchased products tags
description: Add the tag to the order when a purchased product has some tags.

name: Tag the order by purchased products titles
description: Create tags from products display names (titles) and add this tags to the order.

name: Report on sales of goods and orders
description: A sales and order report message will be sent once a day.

name: Sending a reminder of unpaid orders to users
description: Send a reminder of payment for the order if it has not been paid for several days.

name: New products notification
description: Send a notification to the user about new products in the store after ordering.

name: Supplier notification
description: This message will be sent to product suppliers if their product is ordered.

name: Low stock items report
description: Send every day report with low stock items.

name: Hide out of stock products
description: Hide products whose quantity is less than or equal to zero.

name: Back in stock available products
description: Back in stock products whose quantity is greater than zero.

name: Tag HOT products
description: Marks products that have been purchased with the "HOT" tag, if the product is not ordered within 24 hours after that, the tag will be removed.

name: Send email for first product purchase
description: Send email when some customer ordered some product for the first time.

name: Tag new products
description: Marks products that have been added to the store with the "NEW" tag, then on 30 days after that, the tag will be removed.

name: Hold fulfilments for orders awaiting payments
description: Use this template if you need to pause orders that are waiting for payment.

name: Unpaid order reminder
description: Remind the customer about his order that was not paid within 24 hours.

name: Invoice email for unpaid orders
description: Send order invoice for unpaid orders.

name: Copy purchased product tags to the customer
description: Copy tags of the purchased product to the customer.

name: Send customer activation link
description: Send activation link to the customer email if account not activated.

name: Tag VIP customers by monthly spent
description: Assign tags to VIP customers based on monthly expenses.

name: Coupon for newsletter subscriber
description: Send a discount code to the customer's email that subscribed to SMS marketing.

name: Recover abandoned checkouts
description: Send a reminder and discount code to the customer email if customer left the checkout page.

name: Coupon after first order
description: Send a discount code to the email of the customer who placed their first order.

name: Add an order note for customers with a specific tag
description: Append order note if the customer has a certain tag.

name: Coupon for next orders
description: Send a discount code for future orders based on the order amount.

name: Unpublish out-of-stock products after 3 days
description: Hide a product if it's out of stock within 3 days.

name: Add an order tag for returning customers
description: Add tag 'Returned customer' to the order when customer makes order after 90 days from his previous order.

name: Copy customer notes to their orders
description: Copy notes about customers into their orders if they existed when the order was created.

name: Tag new customers
description: Add "New customer" tag when the customer is created.

name: Untag orders when fully paid
description: Remove the "Unpaid order" tag from order when it is fully paid.

name: Untag orders when paid
description: Remove the "Unpaid order" tag from order when it is paid.

name: Add default custom attributes to new orders
description: Add custom attributes to the order when it created.

name: Add a note to new orders with a specific tag
description: Add a record to the order notes if an order has a certain tag when it is created.

name: Copy order notes to customer note
description: When order is created copy order notes to customer notes.

name: Tag cancelled orders
description: Add and remove tags when order is cancelled.

name: Tag orders by discount code
description: Add tag with discount code to the order.

name: Untag customers when a certain product is refunded
description: Remove the tag from customer if a product with a certain title is refunded.

name: Archive orders when fulfilled
description: Archive orders when they are fully fulfilled.

name: Capture order payment after a week
description: Capture order payment after 7 days.

name: Mark as paid for customers with a specific tag
description: Mark an order as paid by a customer with a specific tag and remove the tag from a customer when the order is created.

name: Auto publish new products
description: Publish a new product if it is active and not yet published.

name: Tag the customer's first order
description: Assign a tag to the first order made by the customer.

name: Auto-tag orders when paid
description: Assign a tag to the newly-paid order.

name: Get notified on Slack when a customer requests a return
description: Receive a customizable slack notification when a customer submits a return request from their account.
